name: Google Calendar - Removes Search (6/2011 layout)
description: Google Calendar just released a new design and layout on July 2, 2011.  For those of you, like me, who think the new design provides an overly-large search box and Google logo, this simple user style will remove the dive that contains those two items.
additional_info:
Version 1.0

Created on July 2, 2011 using Firefox 4.0.1 by Amanda L. Sage
